name: Epithet Wars
description:
A single-player 2D fighting game that uses a turn-based combat system based on a radial menu system and exaggerated animations. The game was inspired by the Greek Goddesses, and the attacks are based on the Homeric Epithets of each goddess.

Unfortunately I only had time to make Athena, but I had planned to include Aphrodite, Artemis, and Hera as the other playable characters.

I did all the programming and art of this game myself as a way to learn more about Unity and as a creative project to present for my Classics class at the end of the semester.
